B2 the part of the body above and slightly narrower than the hips: a small/narrow/tiny/large/thick waist These trousers are a bit tight around my waist.
airdone/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
the part of a piece of clothing that goes around or covers the area between the hips and the ribs: The skirt had an elasticated waist.
Saksoni/iStock/Getty Image Plus/GettyImages
